results.name: a(n) = largest m such that m! divides 1+2+...+n; a(n) = A055881(A000217(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10080
formula: a(n) = A231719(A226061(n+1)). [Not a practical way to compute this sequence, but follows from the definitions]
xref: A042963 gives the positions of ones and A014601 the positions of larger terms.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 18 2013
